articles.author: Adam Spencer
articles.title: Kirk Herbstreit explains the biggest difference between SEC and national title games for Georgia - Saturday Down South
articles.description: Kirk Herbstreit explains why Georgia was able to win on Monday night in Indianapolis.
articles.content:
Kirk Herbstreit was on the call Monday night as the Georgia Bulldogs took down Alabama and claimed their first national title since 1980.
The Bulldogs avenged an SEC Championship Game loss in which … [+768 chars]

articles.title: Deon Lendore killed: Former Texas A&M track star and Trinidad Olympic medalist killed in crash - KTRK-TV
articles.description: Deon Lendore, 29, an Olympic medal-winning sprinter for Trinidad & Tobago and former NCAA champion at Texas A&M, was killed in a crash in Texas.
articles.content: COLLEGE STATION, Texas -- Deon Lendore, an Olympic bronze medal-winning sprinter for Trinidad & Tobago and former NCAA champion at Texas A&M, was killed in a head-on collision in Texas, state… [+1928 chars]
